live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35512.summary: Some customers in West Vancouver & North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35512.title: Mar 28 – West Vancouver & North Vancouver | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Fix in Progress)
